author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Although 0-backlog is documented to mean 'up for grabs', feedback is that it's not obvious and backlog may be interpreted as backlog (planned items) by the PowerShell team. 

2-Ready is intended to mean ready to start work, but may be interpreted as ready to merge.

comments.author: HemantMahawar
iSazonov
comments.body:
It would be good for the community to have a description of all labels.

Need fix  `0 - Backlog` in [CONTRIBUTING.md ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#contributing-to-issues)

Poweshell committee makes the most important conclusions. But now the conclusions don't marked. Maybe add label `Resolution - Committee`  ?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
#2681 to fix CONTRIBUTING.md, thanks for the catch

@PowerShell/powershell-committee I like your suggestion on 'Resolution - Committee' although it's more of a direction/decision than a resolution (unless it's a question)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT  `Resolution` is only sample from me.
I agree that options may be direction/decision/conclusion/...

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov thanks for the feedback, @PowerShell/powershell-committee has added `Committee - Reviewed` label and used it

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT Thanks! It's very useful.
List of issues which probably should be marked [Search `committee`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/search?p=1&q=committee&type=Issues&utf8=%E2%9C%93)

title: Consider renaming 0-backlog and 2-Ready labels
